and what I'm gonna do with this today is
I'm gonna go kind of old-school and show

those are barding and larding and you

since I'm showing you two different

now the flavor profile here with this

and whenever you're feeding a crowd a

that might sway a little bit if you're

inedible in a way so you might want to

sheep or
beef and you need to spread it out a

you guys you might say well is this how

way crosswise in between each of the

it's kind of called a dry brine dry

now if you had a bigger cut of meat you

into the refrigerator alright guys so
